title: 【Student Dormitory】Academic Year 113(2024-25) Winter Vacation Dormitory Application
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Academic Year 113(2024-25) Winter Vacation Dormitory Application
日期： Thu, 7 Nov 2024 11:44:25 +0800

Dear Dormitory Residents,
Important information regarding the Academic Year 113(2024-25)Winter Vacation Dormitory Application is listed below:
1、	Application Time
1)	Time: 2024/12/09(Mon) 12:00 – 2024/12/17(Tue) 12:00
2)	Login e-mail and password   https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/Winter/login.aspx
***ALL PREVIOUS STUDENT DORM FEES MUST BE PAID BEFORE APPLYING FOR WINTER DORMS ***(including fees relevant to quarantine dorm).
2、	Application Eligibility
Students who are eligible for dormitory application of Academic Year 113
3、	Application Procedure 
Apply Online(https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/Winter/login.aspx) –> Pay Fee –> Take receipt to the dormitory manager as proof of payment before moving in
4、	Accommodation Period
2025/01/13(Mon) 17:00 – 2025/02/14(Fri) 10:00
1)	No short-term accommodations, early check-ins, or extended check-outs will be accepted. No refunds shall be granted.
2)	Dorms will be closed between 2025/01/27(Mon) and 2025/02/02(Sun) for Chinese New Year holidays. The university administrative unit doesn't operate during Chinese New Year, we encourage local students to go home during vacations. 
5、	Announcement of Accommodation Information
1)	Time: 2024/12/25(Wed) 12:00, room and bed numbers will be announced online
2)	Room and bed will be assigned by OSA. All residents shall temporarily move to Dormitory 5(Shing Yun A and B), Except for Academic Year 113 residents of Dormitory 1(Jie Yun A and B) and Dormitory 5 (Shing Yun A and B). There are 250 beds vacancy this year with priority given to international students and individuals with special circumstances.
6、	Dormitory Fee
1)	Payment Period: 2024/12/26(Thu) 12:00 -2025/01/05(Sun) 23:59. 
2)	Pay at https://school.bot.com.tw/twbank.net/index.aspx . Take the receipt along with your Student ID Card to the dormitory manager when moving in.
3)	Dormitory fee NT2000, deposit NT500.
7、	Notes
Please read all rules and regulations concerning Dormitory Accommodation before applying for Winter Vacation Dorms.
1)	NDHU Dormitory Regulations
2)	NDHU Guidelines Governing Student Dorm Applications and Refunds
3)	NDHU Student Dorm Electrical Appliance Usage Regulations
4)	NDHU Student Dormitory Penalty Standard
5)	NDHU Dormitory Life Convention
For any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at 03-8906217.

中文 https://osa.ndhu.edu.tw/p/404-1005-230389.php 
English https://osa.ndhu.edu.tw/p/404-1005-230390.php

Your safety, OSA's delight!
Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
